title: DVDFab 9.17.4-Final-November 12, 2014.rar
description:
Changes in DVDFab 9.1.7.4 (November 12, 2014):

 New: Improved support for DVD copy protection.

 New: Added support to copy DVD to Blu-ray in Copy
 module. More info: http://www.dvdfab.cn/dvd-to-blu-ray-converter.htm

 New: Added Ã¢â‚¬Å“MergeÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ feature in DVD Ripper and Blu-ray Ripper.

 New: Improved H265 (HEVC) conversion in Ripper and Video Converter.

 New: Improved file merging feature in Video Converter.

 New: Added support for the latest IntelÃ‚Â® HD Graphics driver version 15.33.30.64.3958.

 New: Added new profiles for iPod Nano 7, iPad Air2 and iPad mini 3.

 Fix: Added Ã¢â‚¬Å“Crop automaticallyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ option back.

 Fix: A memory leak issue when opening DVD source in certain cases.

 Fix: A problem that the HD audio could not be removed when selecting Ã¢â‚¬Å“Remove HD audioÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ option in Blu-ray Copy module.

 Fix: A pixelation problem when compressing Blu-ray to BD25 with IQS GPU in certain cases.

 Fix: A crash problem when adding the external subtitle in certain cases.

 Fix: A crash problem when ripping Blu-ray to mkv.passthrough in certain cases.

 Fix: A black screen problem when playing back the converted .mp4 files with remux subtitles on in certain cases.

 Fix: A problem that DVDFab could not open some special .vob files in Video Converter and Creator.

 Fix: Some minor changes and improvements.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The best way is to uninstall your current version with a perfect clean and all especially concerning all registry keys, ect...

Then reboot afterwards anyway.

Disconnect from internet and install this new one till complete installation.

If you need to reboot again, then do it and stay still disconnected from internet so.

For now, use the path provided for and proceed as needed/following anyway.
You can keep the original name or switch to another one, it doesn't matter.
(patch must be used with full administrator privileges)

Load DVDFab to sse what 's going on for its first load/run.
Close DVDFab now. (at its first load DVDFab may not be activated again)

But generaly at it's second load/run, all is automaticaly fixed as full registered anyway)

Except this time or DVD to Bluray option will not work at all. All other options seem ok anyway.

Afterwards,

Reconnect to internet and now, you are ready to enjoy so.

Never update to another new version and do not accept to particip to program experience and never try to activate it by the famous button provided for.

If you follow my advises, you should normaly be ok as described right here.




best regards
